name: Split and Slash
description:
Split and Slash

An horror game made in 3 hours for the Tri-Jam 197.

Your students need to escape from an haunted school, select them and split your team to avoid to get killed by the hunter.

Controls: 

Left click: select your students and the rooms where you want to split them

Right click: Move your students

Programmer: Pitivie

Game design/Art: Raynorr

2D Art: Thiradil

Engine: Godot

Music: Dark ambiance by https://ansimuz.itch.io/mystery-music-collection-pack-1
